main event: A civilian observed two unidentified flying objects on 13 September 1966 in San Bernardino, California.
interesting points: The sighting involved two lights that moved in a horizontal motion slower than a normal aircraft,The observer described a white light and a smaller red object that emerged from the white light,The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds,The witness claimed there was no sound detected from the objects,The observer was a 17-year-old interested in aeronautics.
